FIT if anybody wants the bottom line on shortselling here it is Joe Kennedy made a hundred million dollars shorting the stock market during the great depression Shortly after the depression they made Joe Kennedy the chairman of the SEC and he immediately created the uptick rule which prevented naked shortselling That rule stayed in effect until 2007 and was removed just before the market collapse of 2008 and 2009 if a player or institution has enough money and can do naked shortselling they can take any stock to zero this is what they did to the financial institutions in 2008 Lehman Brothers bear Stearns citigroup and the rest Fitbit should be eight to ten dollars easily instead the shorts can take it down to whatever price they want Should be and was illegal for 8 decades after the great depression
FIT the only thing that can move this is growth in Recurring revenue or major health deals Or if lucky a GOOG Tie up

FIT The bottom line on subscription services what value is the data Who benefits dollarwise Hint a life insurance company has already said they dont care about the data and dont do anything with it Life insurer just wants the users to live longer so they can pay premiums longer The insurers promoteencourage tracking cuz that means users care about fitness which can translate to longer lives hence more premiums
